info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 02 at 6:16PM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...An intense snow shower will impact portions of west central Granite and central Ravalli Counties through 700 PM MST... At 615 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking an intense snow shower near Hamilton, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Heavy snow. Winds in excess of 30 mph. Rapid freeze up sidewalks and roads. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hamilton, Woodside, Grantsdale, Corvallis, and Skalkaho Pass. This includes Highway 93 S between mile markers 40 and 53. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
